  • Method Details

    • addPortfolio

      void addPortfolio(Portfolio portfolio)
      Adds a new Portfolio to the database.
      Parameters:
      portfolio - The portfolio to add.

    • updatePortfolio

      void updatePortfolio(Portfolio portfolio)
      Updates an existing portfolio in the database.
      Parameters:
      portfolio - The portfolio to update.

    • deletePortfolio

      void deletePortfolio(Portfolio portfolio)
      Deletes a portfolio from the database.
      Parameters:
      portfolio - The portfolio to delete.

    • getPortfolio

      Portfolio getPortfolio(int id)
      Retrieves a contact from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the portfolio to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The portfolio with the given portfolio, or null if not found.

    • getAllPortfolio

      List<Portfolio> getAllPortfolio()
      Retrieves all portfolios from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all portfolios in the database.
